.. _api_description:

===
API
===

This is the full API documentation of the `cluster-over-sampling` package.

:mod:`clover.distribution`: Distribution of generated samples
-------------------------------------------------------------

.. automodule:: clover.distribution
    :no-members:
    :no-inherited-members:

.. currentmodule:: clover

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated/
   :template: class.rst

    distribution.DensityDistributor
